column5: would like to know if any one knows what the water temp is at traverse bay and any greens in yet

Water temp in around 55F. Had a buddy fish it all last week. Caught 100 fish...8 were walleye...none over 19". Slowest I have seen it I think for forever for this time of the year. I live a 100 miles from Traverse Bay and do not intend going til the middle of October, weather permitting. The Red is starting to heat up with some larger fish being caught, but for the masses that fish it, it's slow also.
Same experience at Traverse Oct. 5, three of us caught 5 walleye in an entire day of fishing. It's the slowest I've seen it in 25 years of fishing there.
The Bites just like a Hoover..................... it Sucked Oct 7
Bite reported good this morning. 8 eyes in the first 1.5 hours, one 29" over 10.Not much on jigs, trolling bite.
